Description:
Detects suspicious command lines that look as if they would create symbolic links to /etc/passwd

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Symlink Etc Passwd
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where Query('ln -s -f /etc/passwd OR ln -s /etc/passwd')
